posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jimi
I need the following N28s please:

Cap Anson
John Clarkson
Charles Comiskey
King Kelly

I would like all cards to be graded by PSA, SGC, or GAI, especially SGC.  I'll take any grade.

I need these n162s:

Anson
Brouthers
Caruthers
Keefe

Thanks!

Jimi

Posted By: BlackSoxFan
Need?? come on now jimi..has your wife gotten to you with
"Honey..i need a new pair of shoes and a dress for dinner tonight?"

Lol

Posted By: Judge Dred (Fred)
If a woman (wife, domestic partner or girl friend) can NEED a dress or shoes or whatever, then WE can be in NEED of a little bit more cardboard.  

It's a sanity check thing.  Dresses and shoes wear out or are worn only once or twice so there's nothing wrong with a piece of cardboard that can bring us an infinite amount of joy whenever we see it or think about it. 

We NEED cardboard!

Posted By: Jimi
However, I got the shoes already and the wife passed up buying some for herself this past weekend....so the heck with that!!!  Bring on the N28s!!



Jimi

Posted By: leon
Never thought I would say this to a guy but "Is my Glasscock too much for you?"  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]       .I could care less I just had to say that..

Posted By: Jimi
....cock!  I forgot how much you were wanting for it, and I don't see it on your site.  Can you send a scan, Leon?  Thanks!  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]



Jimi

Posted By: Jimi
Just picked up the Bennett, so still looking for the others.  Thanks!

Jimi

Posted By: Jimi
an N28 Anson, Comiskey, and Clarkson.  Someone's got them!!!

Jimi

Posted By: Jimi
My needs have been updated.  Check out above.  Thanks!



Jimi

Posted By: Cat
I have a N28 Comiskey in a PSA 5 holder.  The only problem is that I have a very narrow "want list" for a trade and it IS NOT for sale.  But, I'll give it a shot.  I'd trade it for one of the three shown below:

1) an upgrade to my e90-1 Joe Jackson, I have a PSA1 and would like to get to a PSA 3 or 4, or
2) a T204 Ramly Walter Johnson, or
3) a rare back T206 of a HOFer.


I realize, I'll need to send you significant cash back to you for 1 above (perhaps 2 if you have a reasonably graded one), but let me know.  I also have an N28 Anson PSA 3, but the situation would have to be "just right" to pry that out of my hands.

Posted By: Jimi
Yeah, that's definitely quite the list to hit!  Unfortunately, I don't have much to give you.  Cash would have been the better option for me.  Thanks anyway!



Jimi
